mapper.select: SELECT codeFixation from js_activity_template where id = #{atid}
SELECT id,name,createTime,codeFixation,digit from js_activity_template where id = #{atid}
SELECT p.*,t.`name`,t.codeFixation,t.digit from js_activity_product p LEFT JOIN js_activity_template t ON p.atid = t.id where p.pid = #{pid}

SELECT jap.activityPeriods,jap.prizeCode, IFNULL(CONCAT(LEFT(japi.prizeMobile,3),"****",RIGHT(japi.prizeMobile,3)),NULL) prizeMobile, jap.prizeImgUrl,jap.prizeUrl,japi.prizeVideoLink,japi.prizeHeadPhoto,jap.pid,japi.prizeContent FROM js_activity_product jap LEFT JOIN dr_product_invest dpi ON jap.pid = dpi.pid LEFT JOIN js_activity_product_invest_info japi ON japi.piid = dpi.id where jap.`status` = 3 and japi.prizeStatus =2 and jap.pid = #{pid}
